Perceptor::

Perceptor roared and aimed agaisnt Burrock and open fire once more 
time.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Warhead is in vehicle mode, and he's too big to be lifted. At 
> most, SS could get on him.
> 
> Perceptor's shots missed both Burrock and Tyrael, but blew a few 
> nearby trees to splints. The stinger fired by Waspinator, however, 
was 
> straight on target. Burrock was thrown back a dozen meters, making 
him 
> lose his grip over Inferno. He splashed in the water, but before 
> anyone could track him up, he burrowed in the muddy pond's bottom.
> 
> Warhead tried to aim at Shadow Star. He fired many small 
explosives, 
> doing not much damage individually, but devastating in group.
> 
> Warhead: Cowardly foe! Do you think that you could be superior to 
> Milord Megatron? Diplomacy will not prevent your death at my gun!
> 
> At the mention of ruling the universe made by his lieutenant, 
Tyrael 
> frowned. He was going to have a long strategic chat, but that would 
> wait. Megatron was out now, and the true fight would start.
> 
> Tyrael: I see you have come Megatron. Now come. You will learn why 
> they call me the Blue Firestorm!
> 
> He showered his enemy with a rain of light bolts, no bigger than 
> needles.
